title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 421.20 - Records and reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 421.20 - Records and reports

State Regulations
(a) Adoption service shall include
documentation of all services provided in a case record, including but not
limited to reports of inquiries, applications, and all subsequent
contacts. (b) When a social
services district provides adoption services directly, it shall maintain
records and submit reports as required by the department, and such records
shall be in whatever form required by the department. Such records shall be
available at all reasonable times for inspection by representatives of the
department, and photocopies of such records shall be for warded to the
department upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
421.20

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
